definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: wind, weave (cf. derivatives);—Impf. 3 mpl. sf. [[וַיְעַבְּתוּהָ]] Mic 7:3 and (so) they wind it (or weave it; i.e. mischief); so Hi Che GASm, but dub.; Ew rds. [[עָבַט]] = twist, prevert (cp. Joe 2:7, but v. [[עבט]]), We [[וַיְעַוְּתוּהָ]] = id., cf. Now (?), Dr.
